button.detail.description: Button text for viewing detailed history of recommendations on the site.

button.withdrawal.description: Button text for withdrawing recommended earnings from the site.

button.query.description: Button text for querying recommended earnings on the site.

field.id.description: A unique identifier for the referral, referring to the recommendation of the API service site.

field.percentage.description: The percentage of the recommended earnings, calculated based on the order amount.

field.price.description: The order amount used to calculate recommended earnings.

field.reward.description: Recommended earnings calculated based on the order amount and recommendation percentage.

field.userId.description: A unique identifier for the user, referring to the user of the API service site.

field.createdAt.description: The time when the recommendation was created.

field.level.description: The level of the recommendation used to calculate recommended earnings.

field.threshold.description: The threshold for recommended earnings used for withdrawing.

field.inviteeId.description: A unique identifier for the inviter referring to the person inviting others to the API service site.

field.isVerified.description: A flag indicating whether the recommended user has passed verification with real information.

message.deltaPriceForNextLevel.description: The difference between the current order amount and the threshold for the next level.

message.developingWithDrawal.message: Liity asiakaspalveluun käsittelemään nostoa, nostoihin peritään liittyviä tuloveroja.
message.developingWithDrawal.description: A message indicating that the withdrawal function is under development.

message.technicalDetail.description: Technical details of the referral system's implementation.

message.distributionQrDescription.description: Description of the referral QR code.

message.distributionLink.description: Referral link used to bind customers as lower-level customers.

message.updateSuccessfully.description: A message indicating that the referral information has been successfully updated.

message.distributionLinkDescription.message: Jos asiakas rekisteröityy tälle alustalle tämän linkin tai QR-koodin kautta, asiakas sidotaan pysyvästi alaiseksi asiakkaaksesi ja asiakkaan kaikki kulutukset tämän alustan kautta palautetaan tilillesi nykyisen jakosuhteen mukaan.

message.distributionLinkDescription2.message: Tämä linkki sisältää käyttäjä-ID:si. Kun asiakas avaa linkin, käyttäjä-ID:si tallennetaan evästeinä asiakkaan selaimeen, voimassa seitsemän päivää. Seitsemän päivän sisällä, jos asiakas rekisteröityy tälle alustalle skannaamalla koodin, käyttäjä-ID:si ladataan rekisteröintipalvelimelle evästeiden kanssa, ja asiakas voidaan sitoa alaiseksi asiakkaaksesi.

title.price.description: The total amount of referral orders used to calculate recommended earnings.

title.reward.description: Total referral reward calculated based on the order amount and recommendation percentage.

title.level.description: The referral level used to calculate recommended earnings.

title.percentage.description: The recommendation percentage used to calculate recommended earnings.

title.currentLevel.description: The current referral level used to calculate recommended earnings.

title.nextLevel.description: The next referral level used to calculate recommended earnings.

title.currentPercentage.description: The current referral percentage used to calculate recommended earnings.

title.nextPercentage.description: The referral percentage of the next level used to calculate recommended earnings.

title.levelInfo.description: Information about the referral level used to calculate recommended earnings.

title.distributionLink.description: Referral link used to bind customers as lower-level customers.

title.inviteesCount.description: Kutsujien kokonaismäärä, jota käytetään suositustulojen laskemiseen.
